RESERVATION_UNITS.CALENDAR_ID.HINT: To change this ID, re-enable Sync With Calendar above and specify ID of existing calendar. If you leave it empty, a new calendar will be created for this unit.
RESERVATION_UNITS.NAME: Name
RESERVATION_UNITS.CAPACITY.HINT: Number of people this space can comfortably hold.
RESERVATION_UNITS.EXPECTED_USE_PER_MONTH.HINT: Amount of hours the unit is supposed to be used within one month
RESERVATION_UNITS.CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure to remove the reservation unit?

NEXKEY.LOCKS.HINT: Nexkey locks IDs separated by comma. Keys for these locks will be sent to user 30 min prior to reservation.
